description: A 60-second lesson on Color Spaces: RGB, HSV, and Grayscale.

hook.text: Why does the same red look different on your phone and your monitor?

buildup.text: Color spaces define how numbers map to colors. RGB mixes red, green, and blue.

twist.text: Grayscale drops color entirely, reducing each pixel to one brightness value.

climax.text: Choose the color space that matches your task: HSV for color detection, grayscale for edges.

punchline.text: Same image, different encoding, different insights.
